name: GridTsugi
summary:
GridTsugi: Maze of Woven Bridges

A calm mixed-reality puzzle about connecting floating islands with bridges. It starts easy, gets satisfyingly tricky, and has that “one more…” pull. Levels are infinitely replayable—it’s easy to spend hours chasing cleaner solves.

What it is
Each island number equals the bridges touching it. Place single or double bridges, avoid crossings, and connect every island into one network. Cozy, readable, hand-painted look.
